article.headline: SMU 74, LIU Brooklyn 62
article.story: DALLAS (AP) -- Freshman Brian Morris scored 16 points and took down 11 rebounds for Southern Methodist, which beat Long Island 74-62 on Tuesday night. Morris was 3-of-6 from the field and a perfect 10-for-10 from the free throw line. Devon Pearson added 14 points and a game-high 14 rebounds. Dez Willingham also scored 14, and Derrick Roberts had 11 for the Mustangs (2-2). James Williams scored 19 points to lead Long Island (0-3). Randy Jones and Kellen Allen had 12 points apiece.
